name: Showers Pass Cross Country Shorts - Men's
description: Great rides are ones where you never think about what you were wearing. Whether you’re seated and hammering up a fire road, or in ready-position and flowing through berms, the Cross Country short’s stay exactly where they should be, no bunching, no binding. Made by a crew of passionate cyclists at Showers Pass, these shorts are so comfy that all you’ll think about is the trail ahead.Nylon and spandex blend balances durability with stretch.Brushed lining wicks away moisture and glides easily over liner shorts.Rear panel improves breathability.Adjustable tabs at the waist for the perfect fit.Silicone grip on the waistband keeps the shorts right where you want them.2 snap and hook and bar, for a secure closure.Body mapped construction lets the shorts move with you.Reflective details help keep you seen.2 hand pockets and 2 rear pockets provide lots of storage.All pockets are mesh lined for improved ventilation.As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of  their goods and services.
